column4: that shows me an error:"zubair@zubair-laptop:~$ sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg

plus after upgrading i am not able to change my screen resolution.

mcphain: what would happen if i do a fix x from recovery?
lemme give you a clear description of what has happened so far!
i had gusty 6hrs back and everything was fine.
but after upgarding i got several errors!

1. i had two pairs of ubuntu loaders(one pair = each of recovery and the normal loader)eventually i fised it by editing the menu.lst fromgrub folder by marking it as a comment.now it doesnt show. it also never used to load ubuntu.it just used to show a balck rectangular patch in the center of a white screen.dats it.
